analyzed: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur na /

analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni gang /

original: chos ni gang /
analyzed: chos ni gang /
translated: What is the Dharma?

original: sangs rgyas ni gang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni gang /
translated: What is a buddha?

original: ji ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong na chos mthong /
analyzed: ji ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong na chos mthong /

original: ji ltar chos mthong na sangs rgyas mthong /
analyzed: ji ltar chos mthong na sangs rgyas mthong /
translated: How does one see the Buddha by seeing the Dharma?

original: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di la bcom ldan 'das chos kyi bdags po thams cad mkhyen pas /
translated: the Blessed One, the Lord of Dharma, the Omniscient One,

original: dge slong dag /🔽sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo //
analyzed: dge slong dag / sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo //
translated: has said, ‘Monks,🔽those who see dependent origination see the Dharma.

analyzed: sus chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: Those who see the Dharma see the Buddha.’ In that regard, what is dependent origination?

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is called dependent origination.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung @181a *//
analyzed: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung @181a *//
translated: Because this exists, that comes to be;

original: la; 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste /
analyzed: la; 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste /
translated: because this is produced, that is produced.

original: gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
analyzed: gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
translated: That is to say, with ignorance as condition, there are volitions;

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
translated: with volitions as condition, there is consciousness;

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
translated: with consciousness as condition, there is name-and-form;

original: ming dang / gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
analyzed: ming dang / gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
translated: with name-and-form as condition, there are the six sense bases;

original: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /🔽reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
translated: with the six sense bases as condition, there is contact;🔽with contact as condition, there is feeling;

original: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
translated: with feeling as condition, there is craving;

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
translated: with craving as condition, there is grasping;

original: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
analyzed: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
translated: with grasping as condition, there is existence;

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
translated: with existence as condition, there is birth;🔽with birth as condition, there is old age and death,

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste /
translated: grief, lamentation, pain, sorrow, and despair.

original: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, this entire great mass of suffering comes to an end.

original: de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /
analyzed: de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /
translated: Here, through the cessation of ignorance, conditioning ceases.

original: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes ba 'gag /
analyzed: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes ba 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of conditioning, consciousness ceases.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang / gzugs 'gag /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang / gzugs 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of consciousness, name and form cease.

original: ming dang / gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
analyzed: ming dang / gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of name and form, the six sense sources cease.

original: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
analyzed: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of the six sense sources, contact ceases.

original: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /
analyzed: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of contact, feeling ceases.

original: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /
analyzed: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of feeling, craving ceases.

original: sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /
analyzed: sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of craving, grasping ceases.

original: len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /
analyzed: len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of grasping, becoming ceases.

original: srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /
analyzed: srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /
translated: Through the cessation of becoming, birth ceases.

original: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
translated: Through the cessation of birth, aging, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, dejection, and anguish all cease.

original: de ltar @181b sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar @181b sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, this entire great mass of suffering comes to an end.

original: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is what the Blessed One called dependent origination.

original: chos gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos gang zhe na /
translated: What is the Dharma?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
translated: It is the noble eightfold path,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely:

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /

translated: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,

analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: and right concentration.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the noble eightfold path.

analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gcig tu bsdus te /
translated: The attainment of the fruits and nirvāṇa are included in one.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos so zhes bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos so zhes bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One has declared it to be the Dharma.

original: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na /
translated: What is a Buddha, a Blessed One?

original: sus chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sus chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
translated: He is called a Buddha because he has realized all dharmas.

original: des 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi spyan dang / chos kyi sku dang ldan pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos de dag gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: des 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi spyan dang / chos kyi sku dang ldan pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos de dag gzigs pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the eye of noble wisdom and the Dharma body, and it sees those phenomena of training and beyond training.

original: de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the seeing of dependent origination?🔽Here, the Blessed One said, “Whoever sees dependent origination sees the Dharma. Whoever sees the Dharma sees the Buddha.

original: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag pa dang / srog med pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang / ji lta bu nyid dang / ma nor ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
analyzed: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag pa dang / srog med pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang / ji lta bu nyid dang / ma nor ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
translated: It is permanent, without life, devoid of life, suchness, unmistaken, unborn, unarisen,

original: ma byas pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang @182a  @182b  @183a *//
analyzed: ma byas pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang @182a  @182b  @183a *//
translated: not made, unconditioned, unobstructed, non-apprehensible, peaceful, fearless, unassailable, and not naturally luminous.

original: nas de bzhin du me tog yod na 'bras bu'i bar du'ang mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nas de bzhin du me tog yod na 'bras bu'i bar du'ang mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If there is a flower, the fruit will also be accomplished and appear.

original: de ltar phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung brgyu dang 'brel bar blta'//
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung brgyu dang 'brel bar blta'//
translated: Thus, external dependent arising should be seen in terms of its relation to causes.

original: phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel ba ji ltar blta zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel ba ji ltar blta zhe na /
translated: How should external dependent arising be seen in terms of its relation to conditions?

original: khams drug 'dus pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: khams drug 'dus pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of the combination of six elements.

original: khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What are the six elements that combine?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyi khams rnams 'dus pa las phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar blta'o //
analyzed: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyi khams rnams 'dus pa las phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar blta'o //
translated: From the combination of the earth, water, fire, wind, space, and time elements, external dependent arising should be seen in terms of its relation to conditions.

original: de la sa'i khams ni sa bon rten pa'i bya ba byed do //
analyzed: de la sa'i khams ni sa bon rten pa'i bya ba byed do //
translated: In this regard, the earth element performs the function of supporting the seed.

original: chu'i khams ni sa bon brlan pa'i bya ba byed do /
analyzed: chu'i khams ni sa bon brlan pa'i bya ba byed do /
translated: The water element performs the function of moistening the seed.

original: me'i khams ni sa bon yongs su dro ba'i bya ba byed do //🔽rlung gi khams ni sa bon 'bu ba'i bya ba byed do //
analyzed: me'i khams ni sa bon yongs su dro ba'i bya ba byed do // rlung gi khams ni sa bon 'bu ba'i bya ba byed do //
translated: The fire element performs the function of ripening the seed.🔽The wind element performs the function of inflating the seed.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni sa bon la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni sa bon la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do //
translated: The space element performs the function of not obstructing the seed.

original: dus ni sa bon 'gyur ba'i bya ba byed do //
analyzed: dus ni sa bon 'gyur ba'i bya ba byed do //
translated: Time is the transformation of the seed.

original: rkyen 'di rnams med par sa bon las myu gu mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rkyen 'di rnams med par sa bon las myu gu mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: Without these conditions, the sprout would not be produced from the seed.

original: nam phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ma tshang ba med par gyur la de bzhin du chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyang ma tshad ba med par gyur te /
analyzed: nam phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ma tshang ba med par gyur la de bzhin du chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / dus kyang ma tshad ba med par gyur te /
translated: But when the external earth element is not deficient, and similarly, water, fire, wind, space, and time are not deficient,

original: thams cad 'dus pa las sa bon 'gags pa na de las myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad 'dus pa las sa bon 'gags pa na de las myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: then from the cessation of the seed, the sprout is produced.

original: de la sa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rten pa'i bya ba bya'o @183b snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de la sa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rten pa'i bya ba bya'o @183b snyam du mi sems so //
translated: In this regard, the earth element does not think, “I make the seed’s support function!”

original: de bzhin du chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de bzhin du chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: Similarly, the water element does not think, “I moisten the seed!”

original: me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon yongs su dro bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon yongs su dro bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: The fire element does not think, “I ripen the seed!”

original: rlung gi khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon 'bu bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon 'bu bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: The wind element does not think, “I cause the seed to expand.”

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: The space element does not think, “I provide the space for the seed.”

original: dus kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon bsgyur ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //🔽sa bon yang 'di snyam du bdag gis myu gu mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: dus kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon bsgyur ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so // sa bon yang 'di snyam du bdag gis myu gu mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so //
translated: Time does not think, “I cause the seed to change.”🔽The seed itself does not think, “I produce the sprout.”

original: myu gu'ang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems mod kyi /
analyzed: myu gu'ang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems mod kyi /
translated: The sprout itself does not think, “I am produced by these conditions.”

original: 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod la sa bon 'gag pa na myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod la sa bon 'gag pa na myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Nevertheless, when the seed ceases, the sprout arises from the assemblage of these conditions.

original: de bzhin du me tog yod na 'bras bu'i bar du'ang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du me tog yod na 'bras bu'i bar du'ang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, when there is a flower, the fruit will arise.

original: myu gu de'ang bdag gis ma byas /
analyzed: myu gu de'ang bdag gis ma byas /
translated: The sprout is not produced by itself,

original: gzhan gyis ma byas /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ma byas /
translated: not produced by another,

original: gnyis kas ma byas /
analyzed: gnyis kas ma byas /
translated: not produced by both,🔽and not produced by Īśvara, time, atoms, or primordial matter.

original: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig byung ba nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni ming dang / gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig byung ba nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni ming dang / gzugs so //
translated: The four appropriative aggregates that arise together with consciousness are name-and-form.

original: ming dang / gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go /
analyzed: ming dang / gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go /
translated: The faculties that are based on name-and-form are the six sense spheres.

original: chos gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: chos gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o //
translated: The coming together of the three is contact.

original: reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
translated: The experience of contact is feeling.

original: tshor ba la zhen pa ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la zhen pa ni sred pa'o //
translated: The attachment to feeling is craving.

original: sred pa 'phel ba ni len pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa 'phel ba ni len pa'o //
translated: The increase of craving is grasping.

original: len pa las skyes pa'ang bskyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: len pa las skyes pa'ang bskyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o //
translated: The karma that is produced by grasping and that produces a new existence is becoming.🔽The arising of the aggregates from that cause is birth.

original: rgyu de las phung po byung ba ni skye pa'o; ;skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu de las phung po byung ba ni skye pa'o; ;skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o //
translated: The ripening of the aggregates that have arisen is aging.

original: rgas nas phung po zhig pa ni 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: rgas nas phung po zhig pa ni 'chi ba'o //
translated: The destruction of the aggregates after they have aged is death.

original: 'chi zhing myos te mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to;/
analyzed: 'chi zhing myos te mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to;/
translated: Mental anguish is sorrow.

original: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o //
translated: The expression of sorrow is lamentation.

original: rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Pain is the experience of suffering associated with the five groups of consciousness.

original: yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: Mental pain is the suffering of the mind associated with the activities of mind.

original: gzhan yang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Moreover, all the secondary afflictions such as these are called disturbance.

original: de la mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: de la mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o //
translated: Among them, there is ignorance because of great darkness.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so //
translated: There are formations because of the activity of formation.

original: rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: There is consciousness because of the activity of knowing.

original: rten pa'i phyir ming dang / gzugs so //🔽skye ba'i @187a *//
analyzed: rten pa'i phyir ming dang / gzugs so // skye ba'i @187a *//
translated: There is name-and-form because of the support.

original: sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go /
analyzed: sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go /
translated: There are the six sense bases because of the doors of rebirth.

original: reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o //
translated: There is contact because of contact.

original: myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o //
analyzed: myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o //
translated: It is feeling because it is experienced.

original: skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o //
analyzed: skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o //
translated: It is craving because it thirsts.🔽It is grasping because it grasps.

original: nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'o; ;yang srid pa skye ba'i phyir srid pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'o; ;yang srid pa skye ba'i phyir srid pa'o //
translated: It is becoming because it produces a new existence.

original: phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba'o //
analyzed: phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba'o //
translated: It is birth because it is the origin of the aggregates.

original: phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o //
analyzed: phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o //
translated: It is old age because it ripens the aggregates.

original: 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o //
translated: It is death because it destroys.

original: mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan to //
analyzed: mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan to //
translated: It is sorrow because it grieves.

original: tshig gis smre ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gis smre ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o //
translated: It is lamentation because it speaks with words.

original: lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: It is suffering because it afflicts the body.

original: sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: It is unhappiness because it afflicts the mind.

original: nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrug pa'o //
translated: It is despair because it is afflicted.

original: gzhan yang / de kho na mi rtogs shing log par shes te mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang / de kho na mi rtogs shing log par shes te mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: Moreover, ignorance is not understanding reality, not understanding falsely, and not knowing.

original: de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnam gsum mngon par 'grub ste; bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mi g-yo bar nye bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnam gsum mngon par 'grub ste; bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mi g-yo bar nye bar 'gro'o //
translated: Thus, if there is ignorance, the three kinds of volitions are actualized: those that lead to merit, those that lead to demerit, and those that lead to the imperturbable.

original: 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called “volitions with ignorance as their condition.”

original: de la bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de la bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
translated: From volitions that lead to merit, there comes to be consciousness that leads to merit; from volitions that lead to demerit, there comes to be consciousness that leads to demerit;

original: mi g-yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du @187b byed rnams las mi g-yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du @187b byed rnams las mi g-yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and from volitions that lead to the imperturbable, there comes to be consciousness that leads to the imperturbable. This is called “consciousness with volitions as its condition.”

original: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig skyes pa phung po gzugs can ma yin pa bzhi dang / gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang / gzugs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig skyes pa phung po gzugs can ma yin pa bzhi dang / gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang / gzugs zhes bya'o //
translated: The four non-material aggregates, which arise together with consciousness, and the material form, are called name-and-form.

original: ming dang / gzugs rnam par 'phel bas skye mched drug gi sgo nas bya ba byed pa rnams 'byung ste /
analyzed: ming dang / gzugs rnam par 'phel bas skye mched drug gi sgo nas bya ba byed pa rnams 'byung ste /
translated: The development of name-and-form gives rise to the six sense spheres, which are the basis for the performance of action.

original: de ni ming dang / gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ni ming dang / gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the condition of name-and-form for the six sense spheres.

original: skye mched drug po dag la reg pa'i tshogs drug 'byung ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug po dag la reg pa'i tshogs drug 'byung ste /

original: de ni skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the condition of the six sense spheres for contact.

original: ji lta bur reg pa 'byung ba de ltar bur tshor ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: ji lta bur reg pa 'byung ba de ltar bur tshor ba 'byung ste /
translated: Whatever kind of contact arises, that kind of feeling arises.

original: de ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the condition of contact for feeling.

original: tshor ba'i bye brag de dag myong ba dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa de ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i bye brag de dag myong ba dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa de ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The experience of those various feelings, the delight in them, the intense attachment to them, and the desire to remain attached to them is called “craving with feeling as its condition.”

original: myong ba dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa las bdag sdug pa'i ngo bo dang / bde ba'i ngo bo dang 'bral bar ma gyur cig snyam du yongs su mi gtong bar phyir zhing smon pa 'di ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya'o //

translated: The experience, the delight, the intense attachment, and the desire to remain attached to it, thinking “May I not be separated from the pleasant and delightful things that I am attached to!” is called “grasping with craving as its condition.”

original: de ltar smon cing yang srid pa bskyed pa'i las lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis kun nas slong ba de ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya'o //🔽las de @188a *//
analyzed: de ltar smon cing yang srid pa bskyed pa'i las lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis kun nas slong ba de ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya'o // las de @188a *//
translated: The aspiration to be like that and the production of a new existence through the actions of body, speech, and mind that are motivated by that aspiration is called “becoming with grasping as its condition.”

original: las skyes pa'i phung po lnga rnams 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: las skyes pa'i phung po lnga rnams 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The five aggregates that arise from that action are called “birth with becoming as its condition.”

original: skyes nas mngon du 'grub pa'i phung po rnams kyi 'phel ba yongs su smin pa dang / 'jig par 'gyur ba de ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skyes nas mngon du 'grub pa'i phung po rnams kyi 'phel ba yongs su smin pa dang / 'jig par 'gyur ba de ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya'o //
translated: The growth, maturity, and disintegration of the aggregates that arise from birth are called “old age and death” with birth as a condition.

translated: In this way, these twelve factors of dependent origination arise from other causes and other conditions.

analyzed: ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / las dang / rnam par shes pa'o //

analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do; ;las ni zhing gi rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do //

analyzed: ma rig pa dang / sred pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do //

analyzed: de la las dang / nyon mongs pa dag ni sa bon rnam par shes pa skyed do //

original: ma rig pa ni sa bon rnam par shes pa 'debs te /

original: ma rig pa'i lud kyis bran pa /

analyzed: dbang phyug gis ma byas /

analyzed: dus kyis ma bsgyur /

original: rang bzhin las ma byung /
analyzed: rang bzhin las ma byung /

original: byed pa la rag las pa ma yin /
analyzed: byed pa la rag las pa ma yin /

analyzed: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang / der myong ba dang ldan pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa ming dang / gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub bo //
translated: However, when the father and mother come together, when the mother is ovulating, and when other conditions are present, then the seed of consciousness, which has experience, is produced in the womb of the mother, in that place of birth, by the non-deficiency of causes and conditions, in regard to things that are devoid of a self, devoid of a sentient being, devoid of a vital principle, devoid of a person, devoid of an owner, devoid of an experiencer, devoid of a perceiver, devoid of an agent, devoid of a human, devoid of a human being, devoid of a girl, devoid of a boy, devoid of a woman, devoid of a man, devoid of a neuter, devoid of an I, devoid of a mine, devoid of grasping, and similar to space, and by the nature of illusory characteristics.

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu lngas 'byung ste /
translated: Visual consciousness arises from five causes.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /

original: mig la brten pa dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa la'ang brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo //

analyzed: de la mig ni mig gi rnam par @189b shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba byed do //

analyzed: gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba byed do //
translated: Form functions as the object of perception of the eye consciousness.

original: snang ba ni mngon pa'i bya ba byed do //
analyzed: snang ba ni mngon pa'i bya ba byed do //
translated: Light functions as illumination.🔽Space functions as nonobstruction.

original: nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do; ;de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa ni bsam pa'i bya ba byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do; ;de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa ni bsam pa'i bya ba byed do //
translated: The mental activity that generates it functions as attention.

original: rkyen de dag med na mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rkyen de dag med na mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: If these conditions are absent, the eye consciousness does not occur.

original: gang gi tshe nang gi skye mched mig ma tshang bar ma gyur la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nang gi skye mched mig ma tshang bar ma gyur la /
translated: When the internal sense base of the eye is not impaired,

original: de bzhin du gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / de dang / 'byung ba yid la byed pa dag ma tshang bar ma gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / de dang / 'byung ba yid la byed pa dag ma tshang bar ma gyur te /
translated: and likewise, form, light, space, and the mental activity that generates it are not impaired,

original: thams cad 'dus pa de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad 'dus pa de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the coming together of all of these, the eye consciousness arises.

original: de la mig ni 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //🔽gzugs kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de la mig ni 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so // gzugs kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: “In this regard, the eye does not think, ‘I will perform the function of being the basis of the eye consciousness.’🔽Form does not think, ‘I will perform the function of being the object of the eye consciousness.’

original: snang ba'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mngon pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: snang ba'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mngon pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: Light does not think, ‘I will perform the function of revealing.’

original: nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: Space does not think, ‘I will perform the function of non-obstruction.’

original: de dang / 'byung ba'i yid la byed pa'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bsam pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: de dang / 'byung ba'i yid la byed pa'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bsam pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: And the mental activity of the arising of the eye consciousness does not think, ‘I will perform the function of the intention of the eye consciousness.’

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du @190a *//🔽mi sems te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du @190a *// mi sems te /
translated: The eye consciousness does not think, “I am produced by these conditions.”

original: 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod pa las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod pa las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Nevertheless, from the existence of these conditions, the eye consciousness arises.

original: de bzhin du dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang ci rigs su sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang ci rigs su sbyar ro //
translated: The same is true for the remaining faculties, as is appropriate.

original: de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mi 'pho mod kyi /
analyzed: de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mi 'pho mod kyi /
translated: In this regard, no phenomenon whatsoever transmigrates from this world to the next.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa'ang yod do //
translated: Nevertheless, because causes and conditions are not incomplete, the result of action is perceived.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba'ang bzhin me long gi dkyil 'khor du ma 'phos mod kyi /
analyzed: dper na / rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba'ang bzhin me long gi dkyil 'khor du ma 'phos mod kyi /
translated: For example, the reflection of a face appears in a very polished mirror’s surface, and the face does not transmigrate into the mirror’s surface.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir bzhin du mngon pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir bzhin du mngon pa'ang yod do //
translated: Nevertheless, because causes and conditions are not incomplete, the face is perceived.

original: de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su'ang shi 'phos pa med la gzhan du'ang ma skyes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su'ang shi 'phos pa med la gzhan du'ang ma skyes te /
translated: In the same way, here also, no one dies in this world and is born in another world.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bu mngon pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bu mngon pa'ang yod do //
translated: And yet, the effect of action is not lost, because the causes and conditions are not incomplete.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong nas 'gro ste /
analyzed: dper na / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong nas 'gro ste /
translated: The orb of the moon moves at a distance of forty-two thousand yojanas.

analyzed: 'on kyang snod chung ngu chus gang bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gnas de nas ma 'phos te /
translated: And yet, the reflection of the orb of the moon appears in a small vessel filled with water. The orb of the moon does not move from that place,

original: snod chung ngu chus gang ba'i nang du song ba'ang med mod kyi /
analyzed: snod chung ngu chus gang ba'i nang du song ba'ang med mod kyi /
translated: and it does not enter into the small vessel filled with water.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mngon pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mngon pa'ang yod do //
translated: And yet, the orb of the moon appears, because the causes and conditions are not incomplete.

original: de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su'ang shi 'phos pa med la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su'ang shi 'phos pa med la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi /
translated: In the same way, here also, no one dies in this world and is born in another world.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen @190b rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bu mngon pa'ang yod do //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen @190b rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bu mngon pa'ang yod do //
translated: Because the causes and conditions are not incomplete, the results of karma are also evident.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / me ni rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang na mi 'bar gyi /
analyzed: dper na / me ni rgyu dang / rkyen ma tshang na mi 'bar gyi /
translated: Fire does not burn when its causes and conditions are incomplete.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen 'tshogs pa las 'bar ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen 'tshogs pa las 'bar ro //
translated: It burns when the causes and conditions are complete.

original: de bzhin du bdag po med pa'i chos /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag po med pa'i chos /
translated: In the same way, in regard to phenomena that are without a ruler, without an owner,

original: bdag gi med pa /
analyzed: bdag gi med pa /
translated: without a self,

original: 'dzin pa med pa /
analyzed: 'dzin pa med pa /
translated: without a being,

original: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
translated: similar to space,

original: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang / rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang / der sa bon rnam par shes pa las dang / nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa ming dang /🔽gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang / rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang / der sa bon rnam par shes pa las dang / nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa ming dang / gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste /
translated: and whose nature is the characteristic of illusion, when the causes and conditions are not incomplete, the seed of consciousness, generated by karma and afflictions, produces the sprout of name-and-form in that and that place of rebirth, in the mother’s womb.

original: de ltar nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar blta'o //
analyzed: de ltar nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar blta'o //
translated: Thus, the inner dependent origination is to be seen in connection with conditions.

original: de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam pa lngar blta ste /
analyzed: de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam pa lngar blta ste /
translated: The internal dependent origination should be seen in five ways.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / 'pho bar ma yin pa dang / rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung ba dang / de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o //
analyzed: rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / 'pho bar ma yin pa dang / rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung ba dang / de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o //
translated: It is not eternal, not annihilated, not transferred, the effect of a small cause is great, and it is a continuous series.🔽How is it not eternal?

original: ji ltar rtag par ma yin zhe na; gang gi phyir tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: ji ltar rtag par ma yin zhe na; gang gi phyir tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan la /
translated: Because the aggregates at the time of death are one thing,

original: skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams kyang gzhan te /
analyzed: skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams kyang gzhan te /
translated: and the aggregates at the time of rebirth are another.

analyzed: tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po gang yin pa de nyid skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams ma yin gyi /
translated: The aggregates at the time of death are not the aggregates at the time of rebirth.

original: tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gag la skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang 'byung bas de'i phyir rtag par ma yin no //🔽ji ltar chad par @191a *//
analyzed: tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gag la skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang 'byung bas de'i phyir rtag par ma yin no // ji ltar chad par @191a *//
translated: The aggregates at the time of death cease, and the aggregates at the time of rebirth arise. Therefore, it is not eternal.

original: ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not annihilated?

original: tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams sngon 'gags pa las skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams sngon 'gags pa las skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung ba ma yin /

original: ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi /
translated: Nor do they arise from their noncessation.

original: tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la /
analyzed: tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la /
translated: The aggregates that are part of death cease,

original: de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams srad mda'i mtho dma' bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams srad mda'i mtho dma' bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and at that very time the aggregates that are part of birth arise, like the rising and falling of a scale’s beam.

original: de'i phyir chad par ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir chad par ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no annihilation.

original: ji ltar 'pho bar ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'pho bar ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is there no transmigration?

original: sems can gyi ris mi 'dra ba nas skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bar skye ba mngon par sgrub pas de'i phyir 'pho bar ma yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi ris mi 'dra ba nas skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bar skye ba mngon par sgrub pas de'i phyir 'pho bar ma yin no //
translated: Because one establishes the birth that is part of the same life-stream in a different realm of sentient beings, there is no transmigration.

original: ji ltar rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhe na /
translated: How is it that a great result arises from a small cause?

original: las chung ngu byas pa las 'bras bu chen po'i rnam par smin pa myong ste /
analyzed: las chung ngu byas pa las 'bras bu chen po'i rnam par smin pa myong ste /

original: de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, a great result arises from a small cause.

original: ji ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa de ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa myong bas de'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa de ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa myong bas de'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o //
translated: The continuum is like that because the ripening of the karma that is experienced is experienced in accordance with the karma that was created.

original: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par gsungs pa 'di gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du srog med pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par gsungs pa 'di gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du srog med pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang /
translated: this dependent origination that is taught correctly by the Blessed One, if someone were to understand it correctly with correct wisdom, just as it is, constantly and continuously, as devoid of life, devoid of a life principle,🔽as suchness, as non-erroneous, as unborn, as unoriginated,🔽as uncreated, as unconditioned, as unobstructed, as baseless, as peaceful,

original: ji lta bu nyid dang / ma nor ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung @191b ba dang / ma byas pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
analyzed: ji lta bu nyid dang / ma nor ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung @191b ba dang / ma byas pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
translated: as sublime, as empty, as signless, as wishless, as unformed, as free from application, as free from non-application, as free from arising, as free from cessation, as free from affliction, and as free from purification,

original: 'jigs pa med pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / zad pa med pa dang; rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang / med pa dang / gsog dang / gsob dang / snying po med pa dang / nad dang /
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / zad pa med pa dang; rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang / med pa dang / gsog dang / gsob dang / snying po med pa dang / nad dang /
translated: He sees it as nonexistent, as a void, as hollow, as insubstantial, as a disease,🔽as a tumor, as a dart, as a calamity, as impermanent, as suffering, as empty, and as selfless.

original: 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
analyzed: 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
translated: He does not speculate about the past, thinking, ‘Did I exist in the past?

original: 'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig /
analyzed: 'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig /
translated: Or did I not exist in the past?

original: bdag 'das pa'i dus na cir gyur pa zhig /🔽bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji lta bur gyur pa zhig gu snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la mi rtog go /
analyzed: bdag 'das pa'i dus na cir gyur pa zhig / bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji lta bur gyur pa zhig gu snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la mi rtog go /
translated: What was I in the past?🔽How was I in the past?🔽What was I like in the past?’

original: ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: He does not speculate about the future, thinking, ‘Will I exist in the future?

original: 'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Or will I not exist in the future?

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir 'gyur /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir 'gyur /
translated: What will I be in the future?🔽How will I be in the future?🔽What will I be like in the future?’

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam du phyi ma'i mtha' la mi rtog go /🔽'di ci zhig /🔽'di ji lta bu zhig /🔽ci zhig yod /🔽cir 'gyur / sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam du phyi ma'i mtha' la mi rtog go / 'di ci zhig / 'di ji lta bu zhig / ci zhig yod / cir 'gyur / sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs /
